about_the_game:
Demo Version Overview

This Demo is a free version of Cthulhu Detective.

In this demo, players may explore the core gameplay mechanics and experience the process of solving a murder case. You will play through the first case (CASE I) of Cthulhu Detective, while the full version will feature at least four cases.

In the first case, The Mystery of the Bruce Mansion, you will take on the role of a rookie police officer. What seems like an ordinary assignment unexpectedly plunges you into a bizarre world filled with the spiritual corruption of ancient gods and AI absurdities.

On February 27, the Bruce family hosted a Family Day gathering at their masion. However, during the event, Bruce failed to make an appearance. Responding to a report, you arrive at the mansion, which should have been filled with warmth but now instead sends a chill down your spine. You soon discover Bruce's body in a locked room. Tessa, Kelly, Jack, Alfred... everyone in the house harbors dark, unspeakable secrets that you must uncover one by one.

Note: Some art assets in this Demo are placeholders, and additional interactive features are still under development. The final version will provide a more complete and diverse experience.

Core Features in the Demo

  • A New Approach to Interactive Deduction

Leveraging advanced large-language-model technology, every NPC in the game boasts highly dynamic dialogue capabilities. The acquisition of evidence and the process of solving puzzles change in real time based on your interactions with them, ensuring a unique experience every time you play. Through its intricate dialogue system and captivating narrative, the game offers players an entirely new level of immersive detective gameplay.

"Every game is full of surprises. NPCs respond to your questions in their own unique ways—you’ll never know what might happen next."

  • High Freedom Exploration

Unlike traditional detective games with fixed paths, this Demo allows you to roam freely across the map. Interrogate NPCs, gather evidence, and explore your surroundings at your own pace. Whether you uncover the truth or get lost in the fog depends entirely on your wit and decisions.

  • Lovecraftian Influence in Every Detail

The game’s world is deeply inspired by Lovecraftian themes. From environmental design to story elements and character creation, everything exudes an air of mystery and surrealism. Every step of your journey might bring you closer to unraveling deeper secrets—or lead you into greater fear.

Are You Ready for the Unknown?

Cthulhu Detective invites you into a volatile and hallucinatory world where the line between sanity and madness is razor-thin. Will you uncover the truth hidden in the fog, or will you succumb to it?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: violence, blood & frequent gore, partial nudity, and suggestive themes.
